section.p: Avar Hordeth falls at last. Record the codeword Dead.

You can take Hordeth's ship if you like. To do so, fill in the details on the Ship's Manifest. It is a galleon, called the Sea Centaur; you can transfer the crew from your own ship to the Sea Centaur.

Decide which ship you want to travel on. The ship you don't want to use sails to Yarimura with a poor quality crew. Note that it is docked in Yarimura. [You can transfer crew and cargo between the two ships by selecting 'Ship Transfer' from the 'Windows' menu --Ed]

The Sea Centaur was carrying 1 Cargo Unit of Spices, which is yours now. You also find in Avar's sea-chest, and a
